name: Sphera Funds Management
overview: Sphera Funds Management is an Israeli based fund manager, established in December 2003. The Fund is specializing in long-short equity investments specifically, in the realm of Israeli-related companies and the healthcare industry. The Fund currently manages approximately $270M in different investment products.

milestones.description: Moshe Arkin and Sphera Global HealthCare Fund managed by Sphera Funds Management Ltd. acquired 8.5% stake in NeurogesX, Inc.
